thread.title: Regus opens business centre in Livingstone
thread.title_full: Regus opens business centre in Livingstone

title: Regus opens business centre in Livingstone
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Mon, 3 Aug 2015 11:25 Follow @thomasnewcombe Workspace provider Regus has opened a new business centre in Livingstone, Scotland.
The opening will take Regus’ number of UK centres to more than 320, as demand for flexible working continues to increase.
The centre is situated in the middle of a business park in Livingstone.
Regus CEO Richard Morris said: “The opening of another Scottish centre testifies to the need for bespoke and dedicated business spaces that match today’s flexible workforce.
We know that more and more people are working flexibly, instead of the traditional 9-5 in the office, and we are seeing month-on-month growth in interest in flexible working options which provide a more cost effective alternative to fixed offices.”
